Question: How to ensure product quality traceability and anti-counterfeiting throughout the distribution chain
Question_zh: 如何确保产品在整个流通链条中的质量追溯和防伪
KPI Involved: Product regulatory compliance rate, Production quality deviation rate, Drug accessibility
